MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA23 postcode area of West Kilbride. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am, to carry out permanent repair to our underground cable network outside 7 Avondale Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.20am on Monday 19th October 2020.
